page.name: SAMPLE: Being Successful in This Course
page.intro: These tips will remind you about what qualities will make you successful in this course.
page.content:
In order to be successful in this unit you will need to consider the following:

  • Motivation and Self-Discipline are essential because it will be up to you to find time in your day to work with materials and understand what you are doing before moving ahead.
  • Reliable Internet Service
  • Ask Questions if you feel like you are stuck for more than a few minutes. If it is a technical concern or something about course content, you will want to make sure you get help when you are not sure what to do next.
  • Written Communication is essential to success in this setting. You will be required to communicate your ideas clearly and thoroughly when asking questions and submitting assignments.
